title: 求解!!!
author: Q1159655183
txt_content: 为什么我双击MTE 就弹出Path to the minecraft-directory could not be found. please rnter the Path manualy under Options 然后点新建材质弹出Nothing to do 确定后 打开界面 弹出一个 Listenindex uberschreitet das Maximum (-1)

replies.author: RAY5DHao
replies.txt_content:
MC路径没找到..
MTE一点不好用
还不如直接用绘图软件+MC预览呢
